p: Two major compounds from each EO were chosen from GC- MS result and purchased from Sigma-Aldrich having 98â€“99% purity for further bioassay. Larvicidal and adulticidal efficacy of these compounds against A. aegypti was tested following the methods described above. The most commonly used synthetic commercial larvicide Temephos (Sigma Aldrich) and adulticide Malathion (Sigma Aldrich) were assayed for comparing their efficacy with selected EO compounds following the same procedure.
